>The main comp shuts down instinctly. "Now what did you do that for?" All the
>inner auto guns aimed at the bee. "Why are you dl'ing from my main comp?"

"Okay, okay" Scorponok says pushing a button on his arm. Instantly the bee
falls lifeless. "I just wanted to observe it from a scientific point of
view, Sorry" He walks up to it, "i'll just push it how bout?" he says
holding his claws to his sides non threateningly.
